mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM(SELECT RE.RV_NO , TO_CHAR(RE.RV_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RDATE , TO_CHAR(RE.RV_DATE,'HH24:MI') AS RTIME, C.CT_NM, RE.RV_PH , E.EMP_NM,RE.RV_CON, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RE.RV_NO) AS RNUM FROM RESERVATION RE INNER JOIN CUSTOMER C ON RE.CT_NO = C.CT_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON RE.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO ) WHERE 1=1
AND RDATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND RDATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND CT_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR RV_PH LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR EMP_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%' OR RV_CON LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'
AND CT_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'
AND RV_PH LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'
AND EMP_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'
AND RV_CON LIKE '%'||#{searchTxt}||'%'

SELECT RE.RV_NO , TO_CHAR(RE.RV_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RDATE , TO_CHAR(RE.RV_DATE,'HH24:MI') AS RTIME,RE.CT_NO, C.CT_NM, RE.RV_PH ,RE.EMP_NO,RE.RV_COLOR , E.EMP_NM,RE.RV_CON FROM RESERVATION RE INNER JOIN CUSTOMER C ON RE.CT_NO = C.CT_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON RE.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE RE.RV_NO = #{res_no}

SELECT SCD.SCD_NO , TO_CHAR(SCD.SCD_SDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SDATE , TO_CHAR(SCD.SCD_SDATE,'HH24:MI') AS STIME, E.EMP_PH ,SCD.SCD_COLOR ,SCD.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NM,SCD.SCD_CON FROM SCHEDULE SCD INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON SCD.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE SCD.SCD_NO = #{cal_no}
